tests.sic.rnqt.poisson

Class RnQTCpoissonFixedTOpt

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.sic.rnqt.poisson.RnQTCpoissonFixedTOpt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptimizerIntf

    public class RnQTCpoissonFixedTOpt
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptimizerIntf
    class implements an optimizer over the first two variables of the (R,nQ,T) policy, namely the reorder point R and the batch size Q variables, for given (fixed) review period T. The system being optimized faces stochastic demands as described in the class RnQTCpoisson. The solution found is guaranteed to be the global optimum for the given review period T.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2021

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      • minimize

        public PairObjThreeDouble minimize(FunctionIntf func)
                            throws OptimizerException
        obtains the global minimum over all integer R and all integer Q > 0 of the function RnQTCpoisson(R,Q,T) for the given T≥0. Works by incrementing the Q variable at steps of size 1, and for each value of Q, solves the discrete convex programming problem in R, using OneDStepQuantumOptimizer. The algorithm continues incrementing Q until the cost surpasses a lower bound value, in an area in which we are guaranteed that the cost function is increasing in Q when taken at the optimal R(Q) for such Q.
        Specified by:
        minimize in interface OptimizerIntf
        Parameters:
        func - RnQTCpoisson instance
        Returns:
        PairObjThreeDouble // Pair<double[] x, double cb, double lb, double oc> where x[0] is s_opt and x[1] is q_opt for given _T.
        Throws:
        OptimizerException

        Parameters:
